subject: Basketball (College)
Fantasy Sports
Gambling
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The organization barred DraftKings and FanDuel from advertising during the men’s and women’s basketball tournaments, prohibited referees from playing in contests and called off planned talks to iron out differences.
snippet: The organization barred DraftKings and FanDuel from advertising during the men’s and women’s basketball tournaments, prohibited referees from playing in contests and called off planned talks to iron out differences.
